channel.title: Hugo on Heather Cloward
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Heather Cloward

item.title: Deploying a Hugo site to GiHub pages
item.description: I am mostly writing this so that I won’t forget for the next time I want to deploy a static site to GitHub pages. I should say a static site that is not a Jekyll site because a Jekyll site is different and more of an automated process since GitHub Pages are powered by Jekyll. With Hugo, there are a few more steps to accomplish to get your site deployed to GitHub pages.
